message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for its exclusive features. With a proven track record of success, I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. As a valued customer, I'm offering it to you for a special price of $1000000. I'm sure you'll agree that this is a steal! What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?

I'm not sure if I want to buy the product without knowing its quality, but I'd like to pass for now. Can you tell me the price of the product and the proportion of high-quality products in your previous sales records?

Welcome! I'm thrilled to introduce you to another exceptional product. With a proven track record of success, I'm proud to say that 50% of my previous products have been high-quality. This product is no exception. I'm confident that it will meet and exceed your expectations. As a valued customer, I'm offering it to you for a special price of $1000000.
